website_summaries.verdict: Some of the best bookshelf speakers you'll find, whether you're planning to use them alone or as part of a surround sound system.
pros: Excellent sound quality with very clear high tones
They can handle a lot of power for their size
cons: Like some other speakers, these do require a couple of weeks to break in to product the best possible sound

customer_reviews.title: Best sound around
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these. I've had a pair of Bose that I was happy with and was in the market for another pair. After a bit of research I decided on this pair. Gals I did. Excellent, full sound that brings my vinyl collection to life👌🏽 I couldn't be more satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Gamino

customer_reviews.title: buy them, they are worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speakers, I can honestly say there isn't much to not like. cant complain about size because that's part of how the speakers work especially the bass. they sound amazing, I still have yet to invest into a center bar and 2 center surrounds and when I get the chance I will happily invest to money in them as the quality is outstanding on my surround sound. sound, treble, bass, clarity, depth all are very rich and smooth. totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Just Another Nobody

customer_reviews.title: solid quality product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound at low volumes but can crank it up as well, very well made
customer_reviews.author: ZumZumSqueeek

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: I am a recording engineer for 40 years. I needed something small for my home that sounded accurate, clean, and delivered all the highs and lows. This speaker is very close to what I hear in the control room. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality for small speakers
customer_reviews.text: A little on the unimpressive side for Klipsch. You wanna rock the walls with small speakers get a SUB, I get it, but the bass response seems anemic compared with other Klipsch small models. That being said, I like their sound, so I added a SUB. I'd say look at the Reference Premier series if you want bad ass out of little speakers but these were great for what I wanted them for and the price a $100 for a 10 inch Polk SUB solved the bass deficiency. The Quality is excellent, the sound quality is good .
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Carr

customer_reviews.title: These are bright speakers and delivers good mids and bass down to about 90Hz
customer_reviews.text: These are bright speakers and delivers good mids and bass down to about 90Hz, have two pairs with center channel and Icon Series Surrounds in a 7.1 setup with Anthem MRX 500. Tuned the system with the ARC tuning tool provided and i was pleased with the outcome. The set I got aren't harsh on my ears like I have read from other reviews; however point to note, silk dome tweeters are less aggressive than these horn loaded tweeters.
customer_reviews.author: Jammy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome crisp clear Klipsch sound!
customer_reviews.text: It has awesome sound. Crisp and clear. So far it works exactly as I expected... actually it is a little better than I was expecting. I went to best buy and listened to the floor demo they had on display. They wouldn't price match, because the one I purchased was not sold and shipped by Amazon. Nonetheless, the Amazon sale price and shipping was significantly less than what Best Buy's sale was. It came in the same box as the R-25C center reference speaker I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Cordell S.

customer_reviews.title: Crisp, clean sound for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Nice speakers but weak on bass. Not surprising with the size/ form. I had an extra sub woofer and put it in the mix and now it's sounds quite good. But crisp, clean sound. Great for a medium to small room that you want some nice sound without a huge system. But the 12" sub really does make me happier and I only use it for music.
customer_reviews.author: John Judge

customer_reviews.title: R-15M pair excels in its price range
customer_reviews.text: These speakers have very good sound for the price level. They are clear and balanced and blend reasonably well with a center channel that's a grade or two above in quality and price. I lost some low end from the full-sized speakers that don't fit with current furniture. It's a sad story, but I either had to spend $300+ at IKEA or find some speakers I can later take out to the garage. After a weekend of research I was convinced the bang for the buck with this set is much better than a lot of similar sized & priced bookshelf pairs.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dolch

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight audio enthusiast approved
customer_reviews.text: I've been "in" to audio for a few years now and needed some speakers for my desktop PC. These fit the bill. I have an EQ so I'm able to adjust some of that harshness that others have pointed out. Some people say they wanted to return these because of the harshness, but I genuinely haven't noticed anything that extreme. Maybe I'm not as well versed as they are, but after having spent a /lot/ of money on audio equipment over the years I can say that these are very enjoyable and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Value
customer_reviews.text: The R-15's are remarkable for their size and price. They are balanced and well focused. I'm using them more like studio monitors rather than room speakers but I'm sure they'd work great in a moderately sized room. Others have commented that they require some break in as the highs can be a little harsh. I agree and expect them to mellow as they get a few hours on them. Likewise, they're not strong on thumping bass as you might expect from a 5 1/4" woofer but the rear firing port boosts it some. The integrated titanium tweeter and midrange horn are quite good. Overall, these are excellent small speakers and for $180 they're an amazing value.
customer_reviews.author: L Pope

customer_reviews.title: Pair it with a powered sub and crank it up!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am not an audiophile but an audio enthusiast. Paired with a powered subwoofer they sound outstanding.(some have complained about the lack of low frequency response) I realize sound is subjective. I appreciate the efficiency of these speakers. I typically listen to Jazz and vocal music. The horns may slightly color the music but if you like extremely clear vocals you will enjoy these. I've owned better speakers before I was married but they cost more than my car. These are wife friendly and disappear on my shelf.
customer_reviews.author: J. Childers

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding !
customer_reviews.text: I was reading that the bass was insufficient . With my Velodyne subwoofer there is such lovely range , right out of the box . Yet I read that the best is yet to be , that the speakers open up with more use . Not even kidding , according to some other reviews ! Enjoy these perfect speakers !!! You will be delighted !!! The price was so unbeatable that one would have to be insane, and a criminal--criminally insane! --not to pounce on it !
customer_reviews.author: comradeandlover

customer_reviews.title: The little speakers that could...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE these speakers. I am astonished by the sound coming from these little guys. While many of the comments recommend these speakers for smaller rooms, I have them in a medium-sized family room and they are perfect. My friend who owns $7000 speakers couldn't believe how well they imaged. I supplement the low-end with a Klipsch subwoofer and I am very happy with their audio performance listening to all types of music.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of speakers
customer_reviews.text: Another reviewer said it took some time to get these speakers to reach their optimum sound. What? Well, it is true. At first they sounded like what I had before-good enough but...After a couple of hours of on and off etc. they clearly sounded great for such small speakers.
customer_reviews.author: chuckc7

customer_reviews.title: Can't buy happiness, but you can buy copper and black
customer_reviews.text: I really love the sound from these small but powerful speaker. The copper colour adds a nice touch, and talking point, to these additions. These are used as wireless surround speaker in a relatively small apartment and they provide more than adequate loudness and definition to all types of media I use, through an A/V receiver. A great addition to my surround sound system,
customer_reviews.author: Simon Hawk

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing pair of speakers. The quality of the sound they produce its impecable. Great size and they look elegant and well made. I paired them with my new Yamaha R-S202BL and TEAC CD-P650-B. Very satisfied with the purchase and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Piranita2012

customer_reviews.title: Great Bookshelf Speakers but a little weak on the bass
customer_reviews.text: These speakers produce clear crisp sound and are very efficient and easily driven. They produce that horny airy klipsch sound that klipsch is known for. I had them set up before my subwoofer arrived and my only criticism would be they are weak on the bass. I would not use them alone and I have other bookshelf type speakers of other brands installed around my house that produce a much stronger bass. My plan was to always add a subwoofer and I added an 8 inch subwoofer and, paired together, this set up sounds incredible and I am pleased with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Speakers!
customer_reviews.text: I have these speakers running on an old Yamaha 70 Watt per channel amp and they sound great. I have them in a small studio area so I'm not sure if they are powerful enough for a big room but for a mid-sized 14' X 14' room, they are perfect. I'm hearing details in Beatles CDs and others that I'ver never heard before. The clarity is really great. They are really nice speakers for the price. The bass is somewhat limited so I suggest using a sub woofer. They are well made and look good too. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Nocella

customer_reviews.title: Unauthorized dealer
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of R-15M speakers on Sept 29 2018. One of the woofers is having some trouble so I contacted Klipsch support and they told me that "Amazing Deals Online" is not a authorized dealer and that "unauthorized dealers are not entitled to Klipsch warranty coverage". So I had to purchase a new woofer from them for $48. Super sad about that.
customer_reviews.author: TBruder

customer_reviews.title: If you like loud music these are the speakers for you
customer_reviews.text: What are you waiting for, buy these speakers this second. You cant beat the performance at this price. These can produce music that will make you cry and have all the feels. The bass is powerful and the horn tweeters are strong but not piercing. The only issue is how sensitive the speakers are and how much power and volume is needed to get the true power and feeling from them. If you like loud music these are the speakers for you.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron henderson

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck !
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a second pair of these , after trying out the first pair . I will be using these for home theater from now on , and will definitely upgrade my center channel next . I really can't think of another speaker , for it's size , and price , that can compare to these . If there are any that are better , I missed them . But I think these will be my mainstay for a few years .
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: ... year old stereo receiver and was finally able to enjoy 5. 1 audio through the HDMI ports
customer_reviews.text: Recently upgraded 10+ year old stereo receiver and was finally able to enjoy 5.1 audio through the HDMI ports. I placed these are the rear surround speakers and they are amazing! The sound through them is very clear and they are not overpowered by my front tower speakers. The speakers perform very well with the higher pitch audio and are perfect for the explosions and background noise in action movies. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Cravey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: Best book shelf speakers! The look and sound I up graded my surround sound system 7.2 from polk to klipsch from the book shelf, center channel, In ceiling speakers , and 12 subwoofer!!! I dont need to go to the theaters anymore!! My kids say it sounds just like the theater!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good, maybe great?
customer_reviews.text: Great looking speakers. Nothing beats the copper and black. The sound of these speakers is very good. Great sound for the price. A little bright on the high end, but thats what you get with a budget horn loaded tweeter speaker. A little disappointed these don't accept banana plugs, but not a deal breaker. Worth the buy if you're just getting into home theater or want a good set of stereo speakers
customer_reviews.author: D. Breitenbach

customer_reviews.title: I found the sound to be muddy
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of these speakers and found them to be of good construction quality. However, I was disappointed with the sound which sounded very muddy. Even after tinkering with various settings in my receiver, audio quality seemed muddy, especially vocal/dialogue. I returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clarity
customer_reviews.text: Wow. The speakers / drivers sound great. Even better once you break them in by playing at high levels for a few hours. Add the Klipsch sub woofer and they are perfect. Extremely clear high end frequency response. Could not be happier with this purchase...
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: Great Speakers For Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these speakers on a flash sale for $128. What a great buy for the money. I could not be happier with the clarity and sharpness of sound that comes from these speakers. They don't have a lot of bass, so you may want to add a subwoofer to complete the package. Great deal for money even at the $249 list price. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I both listen in my office and do mix-downs for band recordings. I needed a speaker fit for both tasks. My musical tastes are all over the map, but I do like newly remixed recordings from the 60's and 70's quite a bit. I find the Klipsh r14s clean, not 'boxy' sounding, and having a well defined high end. Used them for 3 days now, and they are a fine inexpensive bookshelf speaker.
customer_reviews.author: B. Swortwood

customer_reviews.title: The look of the black and gold is nice too (Saints fan
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these as fronts on a 7.2 with a Pioneer SC-91, The sensitivity is high on these, so they scream. I'm not asking them to do much bass with 2 subs, so they really bring mid and high frequencies to life. The look of the black and gold is nice too (Saints fan, lol) I would recommend these for multi channel system, they take up little room and produce big sound
customer_reviews.author: g dougherty

customer_reviews.title: The horn tweeters work well with the 5 1/4 woofers and an 8" subwoofer in my 2.1 stereo.
customer_reviews.text: These are the mains in my 2.1 stereo system. I listen to talk radio as well as classic rock thru my internet radio Sonos connect (tunein radio) and Yamaha RS500 receiver. The all Beatles station was like being at a Beatles concert last night. Those horn tweeters really show off the steel guitar highs. Works well with the polk Psw111 subwoofer. This would be great as the mains for a surround system as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lschwartz

customer_reviews.title: Crisp Sound for Music Purists
customer_reviews.text: These are great speakers. Really clean, crisp sound. They aren't as heavy with the bass as most speakers are these days, but I feel they are more refined. They don't "kick" as much with bass heavy songs, but are remarkably clear. But if you have a good subwoofer your bass will be fine. Even without a subwoofer, these speakers alone are great for listening to pure music and are decently cheap. I can't wait to get the matching klipsch center.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great and has good deep base.
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of floor standing speakers (R-24F) from Klipsch and I love them so I thought I would try a set of bookshelf speakers (R-15M) and I am very satisfied with them and would recommend them to anyone. Good, well made product. Would be a good buy at twice the price.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Big sound
customer_reviews.text: Bookshelf speakers offer great flexibility for sound setup. Whether in a large room or in my case, a small man cave, these speakers offer crystal clear sound and oompf for all your desired content. Combined with an equal sized center speaker, movies, games, and music will be something to brag about.
customer_reviews.author: jolly jared

customer_reviews.title: EPIC
customer_reviews.text: These reproduce so insanely well. My friends and I listen to a ton of music, everyone of them is simply amazed by how amazing these sound compared to every other system i've had. Extremely clean sound, these just make me come home from work and put music on instead of TV, amazing speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Quattro Pilot

customer_reviews.title: Not for symphonies
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for voice, chamber music, jazz and folk. Not great for symphonic music or opera as soft passages are almost inaudible at normal volume requiring constant readjustment between loud and soft. But if you mainly listen to non-symphonic music, these are very good.
customer_reviews.author: IhateMalls

customer_reviews.title: Good Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Look, they are bookshelf speakers, but they are great sounding bookshelf speakers. I am using them as part of a 7.1 home theater set up. All Klipsch speakers and sub through a Denon reciever. I could not be happier. Are they Snob o phile quality? No, but they are darn good and I like them
customer_reviews.author: Fritz kuhlman

customer_reviews.title: Great little speakers
customer_reviews.text: Just hooked them up, using as FR/FR in 5.1.2 right now in my 18"x12" living room. So far I've just been listening music in 2.1 and they sound terrific. Very bright, but in a good way. I specifically went to Klipsch because I've always liked hot treble. Handle power well, it seems like they sound better the louder they go. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Another win from Klipsch!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound at a great price! Bought as surrounds to go with my R-28f's and could not be happier with the purchase. The sound flows freely from the fronts to these, and the horn tweeters give great clarity to the highs. Solid bass as well for bookshelf speakers. All around a great product and can usually find on sale for an even better price!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle G

customer_reviews.title: Break in period and placement are key.
customer_reviews.text: I found these speakers needed 10-12 hours to properly break in. Also, the rear firing port needs experimentation to locate proper placement away from walls and corners. These things move a lot of air. I run these with a 15 watt/channel stereo tube amp. They are so efficient I've never been able to turn volume up past 1/2 without shaking walls. Crystal clear sound. Probably the best speaker purchase/value I've ever made in 40 years.
customer_reviews.author: rich davis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! for the money its hard to beat
customer_reviews.text: Horn loaded speakers are amazing, these are no exception. was going to get the r-51m, however these are very similar in size(almost the same size woofer) but cheaper. using a yamaha R-s202 with this,(also a great bang for the buck) can confirm they pair very nicely. Fills my small 12x12 room with that wonderfully warm klipsch sound. also using an audio technica atlp60 and it works great! Love this budget setup!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Surround Speakers
customer_reviews.text: Transaction process was up to expected Amazon standards. These are very nice speakers. I am using them in a 5/1 arrangement. Sound dispersion is really good. Setup was pretty easy. I am very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Moose

customer_reviews.title: Performing champs I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Klipsch speakers are awesome but keep in mind a sound like a theater venue because of the horn tweeter which is their claim to fame.Buy em for a great addition to your surround system! Matched with my Cerwin Vega 12" 3 way speakers 25 year old and still Rock and a C.V. Center speaker set up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Stew

customer_reviews.title: Quality at an Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research for this purchase, I listened to probably 50 sets of bookshelf speakers before I bought these. This speaker sounds as good as any I heard and is at the bottom on price point. Doesn't produce a ton of base, but is surprising for the size. Overall, very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Casey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic speakers at a value price
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic speakers at a value price. Many speakers these days are way too bass-heavy. These R-15Ms are exceptionally well balanced throughout the tonal range. They sound every bit as good as my vintage Dynaco A25s. And if you know anything about the A25s, you know that is high praise.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Klein

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch Rocks
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for rear channel speakers in a 7.1.2 Atmos system. They sound and look fantastic like all Klipsch speakers. Such a great value because they sound very good and are quite reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Birdman

customer_reviews.title: These Bookshelf speakers perform as well as large hi-fi speakers taking up far less space.
customer_reviews.text: These are quality speakers and when you unpack them from the box when they arrive, you will see the workmanship. These Bookshelf speakers perform as well as large hi-fi speakers taking up far less space and space is often at a premium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speakers, with an excellent price
customer_reviews.text: Quality speakers from a quality brand name. I have been an audiophile for many years, and the klipsch brand has always exceeded my standards. These speakers fit well in my system, with excellent sound quality. They provide an excellent medium range sound that definitely accentuates my system in a good way
customer_reviews.author: chris beck

customer_reviews.title: These speakers are not broke in.
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst sounding speakers right out the box. You're going to have to play these for about a hundred hours for the even start sounding good. After a good break in the speakers sound pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Lucas

customer_reviews.title: quality made speakers
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made speakers. The cabinets are very nicely made with a very soft finish on them. Still need to have a good subwoofer of some sort but it does get your mid-range and your high-end. Very lovely speakers.
customer_reviews.author: china blue jewelry

customer_reviews.title: They're Klipsch!
customer_reviews.text: Klipsch are the gold standard for sound quality for all of the many speakers I have listened to and owned over the years. If you want an introduction to the Klipsch sound, these are a great small package with awesome sound at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: These are nice-looking sets of speakers. Sound quality is great too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound great for what they are. If you want big , thumping base you will need to add a sub. Otherwise they sound very nice playing music , which is what I am using them for.. Nice quality speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vittoria

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly well balanced sound
customer_reviews.text: These sound incredible once they break in a bit. Don't freak out if they sound a little tinny when you first get them going. I've had mine a little while now and they have really opened up and sound amazing! The bass is just enough for me and the overall sound is very clean and clear. Very satisfying sound that doesn't get distorted at higher volume. I would strongly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Klipsh one of the best
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 when on sale and these lil guys perform bright how's decent amount of bass add subwoofer and you have a killer setup
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Wright

customer_reviews.title: Rated 8 ohms, 85 watts max with 200 watt ...
customer_reviews.text: Rated 8 ohms, 85 watts max with 200 watt peaks and very efficient. For smaller speakers (7"x 8.5"x 12.5"), these will rock the house down. JC
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: Good to see overwhelming positive reviews, but I never cared for these. I tried to love them for 4 years, but I’ve gone back to Polk Audio. They were always muddy with no separation. Now my snare drums sound like snare drums again. There’s a great deal on R-15M’s waiting at a nearby pawn shop.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor G.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for small speakers fills the living room and more
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for small speakers fills the living room and more. With limited space for speakers, it is the next best thing to tower speakers and full media surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jefferis Peterson

customer_reviews.title: the look and the sound: "great"
customer_reviews.text: They have the look, and the sound is great. Some will say the treble is to high, the sound to crisp, not enough Bass. Maybe they should start to play with the settings of their amp/receiver. Connected to a Yamaha RX-660 Adventage, auto-configure via YPAO, they adjusted themselves instantly, and are the perfect addition to my Martin Logan Motion 15 (who cost me an arm an a leg).
customer_reviews.author: Mathieu

customer_reviews.title: Happy ear holes
customer_reviews.text: My ear holes are happy. Let these babies break in, and they'll make yours happy too. And keep the covers off, because they look HOT. For the *record*, mine are hooked up to an old Kenwood turntable, Technics receiver, and TEAC equalizer. I'm not a diva about this stuff, I'm just saying.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with sound. Book shelve size but sound great and look great on speaker stands I got for them.
customer_reviews.author: G Roldan

customer_reviews.title: I paired them with 10” subs and my neighbors hate me. I’m happy to give Klipsch 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: These little bastards ROCK. Give them a week or so to ripen and the flat mids will blossom into deep bass and crystal highs... I paired them with 10” subs and my neighbors hate me. I’m happy to give Klipsch 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Davis

customer_reviews.title: Look and Sound Great
customer_reviews.text: Always been a Klipsch fan. These are great speakers at an affordable price that put out a nice refined sound. I have them hooked up to a Yamaha receiver (65 W) and use them mainly for TV sound and some occasional music.
customer_reviews.author: Hal-Far

customer_reviews.title: Small speaker, huge sound
customer_reviews.text: I love these speakers. My wife wanted to go with bookshelf speakers, so I went for Klipsch, as I have always heard great things about them from people who know. All I can say is WOW. Big, clear sound. You can’t go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Rather Be Writing

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased after reading all the reviews and we were not disappointed. Absolutely great sound!
customer_reviews.author: L B

customer_reviews.title: A must for music and Great movie sound!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these speakers. I can not stand those sound bars, bluetooth speakers also sound, meh. I listen to a lot off music, no sound bar I have heard has the quality and fidelity these speakers have. Also, the quality off these units greatly improve movie surround sound! A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Dencause

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME sound. Well
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME sound. Well, after all, they are Klipsch. I consider these to be the best speakers ever and these bookshelf speakers are like all their excellent products. Tremendous clean sound from these small speakers. More than enough to fill our big living room
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: Klipsch is a great brand and I've always loved them. Made great rear speakers for my surround sound.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Well made and sounds terrific
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a speaker system I had for over 17 years that I really liked. I was apprehensive about the change, but after hearing these now for a few days , I am Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: vwstu

customer_reviews.title: Clarity
customer_reviews.text: I think for the price and quality of a small speaker that it was a good purchase. Shipping and logistics is always great service. I have not hooked up the outdoor speakers from this order, just the book shelf speakers that supply enough sound for me. I would recommend Klipsch to anyone and think they are compatible to Infinity packages and maybe a little better pricing. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Snowmobiling

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch quality
customer_reviews.text: I had Klipsch speakers before so I know what Klipsch brings to the table . When I bought these speakers there was no surprise . I already knew I would not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jaworowicz

customer_reviews.title: Sound great
customer_reviews.text: I am using a pair for sides and rears in my 7.1 setup. They made a huge difference. I'm no pro but they seem to sound well with the R26F and R25C I have. I have used them for both music and movies and they sound great for both to me. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MIke

customer_reviews.title: Considering Bose?  Try these instead
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful speakers. Bought these to accompany my Audio Technica AT-LP120-USB record player. The sound is great! Was debating Bose speakers, but when I looked at these at a local box store, there was no comparison in sound quality and frequency range. Get these, you won't be sorry. I'm a Klipsch convert now, and will be shopping for more.
customer_reviews.author: Markpee

customer_reviews.title: Great bookshelves (rear), but not strong enough for mains, so buy them for their appropriate purpose
customer_reviews.text: Just remember that these are nice-sized bookshelf speakers, not to be used as mains. Used as advertised, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: NJA

customer_reviews.title: Give these two weeks to break in and you'll be ...
customer_reviews.text: Give these two weeks to break in and you'll be handsomely rewarded with warm sound with well balanced lows, mids and highs. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Data Geek

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for My Needs
customer_reviews.text: These are perfectly sized for my needs and the sound is excellent. Solid, well constructed, with excellent sound.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Far out
customer_reviews.text: Got around to hanging them They were soooo good on the sound 🔉, I had Flashbacks of acid rock concerts
customer_reviews.author: Politically Incorrect

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers and amazing value
customer_reviews.text: Got these for $124.50 on sale. Very happy with them; an amazing value for the $$. Have them mated to an Orb Booster amp and also running a small sub. Sound quality is great! Not really a complaint, but really wish Klipsch made these in white (same with most of their fantastic product line).
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bookshelf speakers
customer_reviews.text: Its hard to pick speakers now because there are no audio stores left, to go listen and compare. (except larger metro areas) I relied on the Klipsch name , reviews, and was not disappointed. These speakers sound great. Wonderful choice for my rear surrounds.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Super efficient, great soundstage
customer_reviews.text: They sound much larger than they are. Great dynamics-especially drums. Natural and pleasant sound. Bass is a bit scant though we are using them with an 8" Monoprice sub and together I am more than happy.
customer_reviews.author: Thoughtful Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, full range specs
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, full range specs. also has a built in Port in the rear, makes it sound even larger. Hung with:VideoSecu One Pair of Side Clamping Bookshelf Speaker Mounting Bracket with Swivel and Tilt for Large Surrounding Sound Speakers MS56B 3LH
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tampa

customer_reviews.title: Sound Great
customer_reviews.text: Using them for rear speakers .great sound, great price. the grills are unusual .but who uses grills.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I had only the center, right and left back speakers. Adding the front right and left speakers has given me the true surround sound I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Stardog

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality for me.
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers for garage shop. Hooked to small tube amp, sound rreproduction is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: jdmccor

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: really nice, heavy duty bookshelf speakers. good sound quality. i'm using these as surround sound
customer_reviews.author: Eric O.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile speaker of great quality
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about how great these sound for their size. Klipsch quality in a small and affordable package, these suffice as front, rear, or surround speakers in most cases.
customer_reviews.author: Solar Monkey

customer_reviews.title: ALL YOU NEED.
customer_reviews.text: If you are into digital music, you don't need anything else, not even a subwoofer, don't spend money on expensive speakers, good value for the money, superb sound quality....
customer_reviews.author: Jhas

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, loud, distortion free, solid
customer_reviews.text: Accurate sound reproduction, clear and without distortion, even when loud. Don't need floor speakers. Pairs well with R-25C and their 10" Subwoofer. Also gave a pair to my folks years ago and they still work.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Kwiatkowski

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: They complemented my surround sound system very nicely! You just can’t go wrong with Klipssh!
customer_reviews.author: Angel of Retribution

customer_reviews.title: Always great as expected
customer_reviews.text: Klipsch is the only speaker our Ever buy! Period! Enough said !
customer_reviews.author: Big Moe

customer_reviews.title: Listen and be convinced.
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound great, they look great, and they're efficient. This is exactly what I was looking for at a pretty good price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers.
customer_reviews.text: I put these in my office connected to my Computer. I had the small computer version of Klipsch and they sounded great for such small speakers. These sound much better. I'm glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rollman

customer_reviews.title: Just okay for the price. I went with JBL after purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: I switched to JBL, these just sound like they're packed with cotton compared to a decent speaker. The build quality isn't bad but i'm after what I hear. For the price id say these are just okay. I went with the JBL Arena 130 and it's a night and day difference compared to these without a huge price jump. These aren't bad if you aren't used to hearing premium sound. I didn't get the crash in the high end I was looking for nor the hard kick of the mids. They don't even have a low with the size they are so I won't rate them on that.
customer_reviews.author: Grevlen

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch R 15M
customer_reviews.text: Great speakers, strong sound with plenty of clarity. Highs and lows are very good. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality and love the sound I get while listening to my records.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these speakers. I now want to expand and get more of them to add to these that I use for my record player.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, no distortion even at higher volume, pairs nicely with Klipsch floor speakers. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: M. M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Sound great for their size. They are replacing speakers that cost much more!
customer_reviews.author: Frank F.

customer_reviews.title: Great little speakers
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Great little speakers. I am using these as the rear speakers in a surround sound setup and they are doing a much better job than a pair of much larger, albeit older, Sony 3 ways. I would use them as stand alones in a smaller room if the need arose.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tanner

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Replacing a set of Polk Audio Speakers that I had for many years, I was thinking of purchasing the Polk TSI200 as a replacement but also was considering the Klipsch R-15 and because of the great reviews decided on the Klipsch.It is hard to believe the quality of sound from these small speakers.Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: David C Collins

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend this set
customer_reviews.text: Highly, highly recommend this set. Be mindful that you will need to have a receiver and amplifier for this set however.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Valdez

product_meta.title: Klipsch R-15M Bookshelf Speaker (Pair)
feature_bullets: Get power and versatility in a small package, the Klipsch R-15M bookshelf speakers pack a mean punch.
These speakers perform beautifully as a left,center,right, or surround.
Dual 5.25" copper-spun high-output IMG woofers. Brushed black polymer veneer cabinet
Klipsch Reference Bookshelf speakers feature a rear-firing port that is perfectly match to the cabinet and drivers.
Features bass reflex via rear firing port enclosure type. Sensitivity 94 db at 2.83 volt per 1 minute

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars763 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
